title: Stuck in loading screen for an hour; unable to join the game
body:
This is what happened; I go into the game with perfectly good internet, and a perfectly functioning computer and on the load screen, it says "100% loaded" below my champion.

After a while, I just restart my client and guess what: it's a remake and I was afk

Now i have leaver buster and it's so UNFAIR!!!!
Also, I lost LP and I WANT IT BACK!!!

HOW IS THIS IN ANY WAY MY FAULT????
I MADE SURE THAT EVERYTHING ON MY FUCKING COMUTER WAS WORKING FINE SO I COULD PALY AND THIS SHIT HAPPENS ARE YOU FKING KIDDING?????????

replies.body: So it sounds like you're loading to 100% and then it doesn't enter the game, so then you force close the loading screen and client? If the loading screen isn't freezing, I'd try waiting a bit longer since it can hang for a second every now and then while loading the assets. If it's freezing up, double check your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and run a quick repair through the game client.
